content: super bulky yarn makes this cozy textured throw pillow knit up quickly this pattern is written for a 20 x 20 approx 50cm x 50cm pillow but contains tips for making other sizes *update 11/27 if you downloaded this pattern before the evening of 11/27 the stitch pattern was wrong it was written for working flat instead of in the round it has now been fixed and the pillow should be worked in the round
